title: Why my Front camera in indoor lighting condition produce yellowish tint both onscreen and pics taken
content:
Hi, I'm facing yellowish tint in the front camera both onscreen and the captured images while using it in artificial indoor lighting conditions,  and while doing video calls I'm encountering the same issue.
please do help me
Note : both the pics were taken on same time, same lighting conditions with front and rear camera.you can notice the cloth in the left side, is the actual colour of it.. but rest of the pic i.e human subject is in yellowish shade
